typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	CarrierCode as string ('AMT1')
}
source(output(
		CarrierKey as short,
		CarrierCode as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_COMMITTED',
	query: (concat('SELECT CarrierKey, CarrierCode From DimCarrier WHERE CarrierCode=', '\'',$CarrierCode,'\'')),
	format: 'query',
	staged: false) ~> Carrier
source(output(
		ClaimNumber as string,
		ClaimTransactionKey as long,
		RowID as long,
		CarrierCode as string,
		ClientCode as string,
		ValuationDate as date,
		{Policy Number} as string,
		Claimant as string,
		Gender as string,
		LOBCode as string,
		ClaimStatus as string,
		MaritalStatus as string,
		ClaimTypeCode as string,
		Occupation as string,
		InjuryType as string,
		BodyPart as string,
		CauseType as string,
		Litigation as string,
		NAICS_Code as string,
		Total_Paid as decimal(18,2),
		Total_Reserve as decimal(18,2),
		Recovery_Total as decimal(18,2),
		Total_Incurred as decimal(18,2),
		Net_Incurred as decimal(18,2),
		Expense_Paid as decimal(18,2),
		Expense_Reserve as decimal(18,2),
		Expense_Recovery as decimal(18,2),
		Expense_Incurred as decimal(18,2),
		Medical_BI_Paid as decimal(18,2),
		Medical_BI_Reserves as decimal(18,2),
		Indemnity_PD_Paid as decimal(18,2),
		Indemnity_PD_Reserves as decimal(18,2),
		Incurred_BI_Med as decimal(18,2),
		Incurred_PD_LT as decimal(18,2),
		Recovery_BI_Med as decimal(18,2),
		Recovery_PD_LT as decimal(18,2)
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: (concat('SELECT ClaimNumber,ClaimTransactionKey,RowID,CarrierCode,ClientCode,ValuationDate,[Policy Number],Claimant,Gender,LOBCode,[ClaimStatus],MaritalStatus,ClaimTypeCode,Occupation,InjuryType,BodyPart,CauseType,Litigation,NAICS_Code, [Total_Paid], [Total_Reserve], [Recovery_Total], [Total_Incurred], [Net_Incurred], [Expense_Paid], [Expense_Reserve], [Expense_Recovery], [Expense_Incurred], [Medical_BI_Paid], [Medical_BI_Reserves], [Indemnity_PD_Paid], [Indemnity_PD_Reserves], [Incurred_BI_Med], [Incurred_PD_LT], [Recovery_BI_Med], [Recovery_PD_LT] FROM stage.ClaimTransaction WHERE CarrierCode =', "'",$CarrierCode,"'")),
	format: 'query',
	staged: false,
	partitionColumn: 'ClaimTransactionKey',
	partitionBy('external', 4)) ~> ClaimTransaction
source(output(
		SystemCode as string,
		TotalRecoveries as string,
		MedicalPayments as string,
		MedicalRecoveries as string,
		IndemnityPayments as string,
		IndemnityRecoveries as string,
		ExpensePayments as string,
		OtherPayments as string,
		LegalPayments as string,
		ALAEPayments as string,
		ExpenseReserves as string,
		OtherReserves as string,
		LegalReserves as string,
		ALAEReserves as string,
		ExpenseRecoveries as string,
		OtherRecoveries as string,
		LegalRecoveries as string,
		ALAERecoveries as string,
		ExpenseIncurred as string,
		OtherIncurred as string,
		LegalIncurred as string,
		ALAEIncurred as string,
		LossLocationId as string,
		LossLocation as string,
		LossAddress as string,
		LossSource as string,
		LOB as string,
		InsuredName as string,
		RowID as long
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_COMMITTED',
	query: ('SELECT SystemCode,TotalRecoveries, MedicalPayments, MedicalRecoveries, IndemnityPayments, IndemnityRecoveries,ExpensePayments,OtherPayments,LegalPayments,ALAEPayments,ExpenseReserves,OtherReserves,LegalReserves,ALAEReserves,ExpenseRecoveries,OtherRecoveries,LegalRecoveries,ALAERecoveries,ExpenseIncurred,OtherIncurred,LegalIncurred,ALAEIncurred,[LossLocationId], [LossLocation],  [LossAddress],   [LossSource],  [LOB],  [InsuredName], RowID From stage.AMT1'),
	format: 'query') ~> stageAMT1
source(output(
		ClaimKey as long,
		ClientCarrierGroupKey as integer,
		Tenure as short,
		LagTime as string,
		DaysToClose as integer,
		Age as integer,
		ClaimTransactionKey as long,
		ClientKey as short
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_COMMITTED',
	query: (concat('SELECT ClaimKey,dc.ClientCarrierGroupKey,Tenure,LagTime,dc.DaysToClose,dc.Age,ClaimTransactionKey,ClientKey FROM DimClaim dc INNER JOIN stage.ClaimTransaction c ON dc.ClaimHashKey=c.ClaimHashKey  WHERE c.CarrierCode=','\'',$CarrierCode,'\' AND dc.ClientCarrierGroupKey<>-99')),
	format: 'query',
	staged: false) ~> DimClaim
source(output(
		InsuredName as string,
		LossLocationId as string,
		LossLocation as string,
		LossAddress as string,
		{Location Name} as string,
		{Department Name} as string,
		{Division Name} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	wildcardPaths:['AMT1/AMT1 Location Mapping.xlsx']) ~> AMT1LocationMapSheet1
source(output(
		ClientKey as short,
		LocationKey as integer,
		Location_Name as string,
		Department_Name as string,
		Division_Name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_COMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT ClientKey,LocationKey,Location_Name,Department_Name,Division_Name FROM DimLocation',
	format: 'query',
	staged: false) ~> DimLocation
source(output(
		{Claim #} as integer,
		{Location Name} as string,
		{Department Name} as string,
		{Division Name} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	wildcardPaths:['AMT1/AMT1 Location Mapping.xlsx']) ~> AMT1LocationMapClaimNo
source(output(
		ClientKey as short,
		ClientCode as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT ClientKey,ClientCode FROM DimClient',
	format: 'query',
	staged: false) ~> DimClient
source(output(
		ClaimNumber as string,
		ValuationDate as date,
		Location_Level1 as string,
		Location_Level2 as string,
		Location_Level3 as string,
		Gender as string,
		Occupation as string,
		ClientKey as short
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_COMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT ClaimNumber,ValuationDate,Location_Level1,Location_Level2,Location_Level3,Gender,Occupation,dc.ClientKey \nFROM stage.ClientClaimTransaction sc\nINNER JOIN DimClient dc ON sc.ClientCode=dc.ClientCode\nWHERE dc.ClientCode=\'KEYSHUM-01\'',
	format: 'query',
	staged: false) ~> ClientClaimTransaction
source(output(
		GenderKey as integer,
		Gender as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_COMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT GenderKey,Gender FROM DimGender',
	format: 'query',
	staged: false) ~> Gender
source(output(
		MaritalStatusKey as integer,
		MaritalStatus as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_COMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT MaritalStatusKey,MaritalStatus FROM DimMaritalStatus',
	format: 'query',
	staged: false) ~> MaritalStatus
source(output(
		BodyPartKey as short,
		BodyPart as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_COMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT BodyPartKey,BodyPart FROM DimBodyPart',
	format: 'query',
	staged: false) ~> BodyPart
source(output(
		InjuryTypeKey as integer,
		InjuryType as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_COMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT InjuryTypeKey,InjuryType FROM DimInjuryType',
	format: 'query',
	staged: false) ~> InjuryType
source(output(
		ClaimTypeKey as short,
		ClaimTypeCode as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_COMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT ClaimTypeKey,ClaimTypeCode FROM DimClaimType',
	format: 'query',
	staged: false) ~> ClaimType
source(output(
		CauseTypeKey as short,
		CauseType as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_COMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT CauseTypeKey,CauseType FROM DimCauseType',
	format: 'query',
	staged: false) ~> CauseType
source(output(
		OccupationKey as integer,
		Occupation as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_COMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT OccupationKey,Occupation FROM DimOccupation',
	format: 'query',
	staged: false) ~> Occupation
source(output(
		AgeRangeKey as integer,
		AgeRange as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_COMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT AgeRangeKey,AgeRange FROM DimAgeRange',
	format: 'query',
	staged: false) ~> AgeRange
source(output(
		ClaimTenureRangeKey as integer,
		ClaimTenureRange as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_COMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT ClaimTenureRangeKey,ClaimTenureRange FROM DimClaimTenureRange',
	format: 'query',
	staged: false) ~> TenureRange
source(output(
		ClaimLagAmountRangeKey as integer,
		ClaimLagAmountRange as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_COMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT ClaimLagAmountRangeKey,ClaimLagAmountRange FROM DimClaimLagAmountRange',
	format: 'query',
	staged: false) ~> LagAmountRange
source(output(
		ClaimClosePeriodRangeKey as integer,
		ClaimClosePeriodRange as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_COMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT ClaimClosePeriodRangeKey,ClaimClosePeriodRange FROM DimClaimClosePeriodRange',
	format: 'query',
	staged: false) ~> ClosePeriodRange
source(output(
		ClaimLossAmtRangeKey as integer,
		ClaimLossAmtRange as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_COMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT ClaimLossAmtRangeKey,ClaimLossAmtRange FROM DimClaimLossAmtRange',
	format: 'query',
	staged: false) ~> LossAmtRange
source(output(
		Date as date,
		DateKey as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_COMMITTED',
	query: (concat('select distinct Date,DateKey FROM DimDate dd INNER JOIN stage.ClaimTransaction c ON dd.Date=c.ValuationDate WHERE c.CarrierCode =', '\'',$CarrierCode,'\'')),
	format: 'query',
	staged: false) ~> Date
source(output(
		ClaimTypeKey as short,
		Rollup_Priority as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_COMMITTED',
	query: (concat('SELECT ClaimTypeKey,Rollup_Priority FROM DimClaimTypeRollupPrority dp INNER JOIN DimCarrier dc ON dp.CarrierKey=dc.CarrierKey WHERE dc.CarrierCode=','\'',$CarrierCode,'\'')),
	format: 'query',
	staged: false) ~> ClaimTypePriority
source(output(
		ClaimKey as long,
		ValuationDateKey as integer,
		Litigation as boolean,
		ClaimTypeKey as short,
		TransactionKey as long
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_COMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT fc.ClaimKey,ValuationDateKey,Litigation,ClaimTypeKey,TransactionKey FROM FactClaimTransaction fc\nINNER JOIN DimClaim dc ON fc.ClaimKey=dc.ClaimKey\nINNER JOIN DimCarrier c ON dc.CarrierKey=c.CarrierKey\nWHERE CarrierCode=\'AMT1\'',
	format: 'query',
	staged: false) ~> FactExisting
source(output(
		{Client Code} as string,
		{Employee Count} as short,
		Location as string,
		{Valuation Date} as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_COMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT [Client Code],[Employee Count], Location,[Valuation Date] FROM stage.EmployeeCount',
	format: 'query') ~> ClientEmployeeCount
ClaimTransaction, Carrier join(ClaimTransaction@CarrierCode == Carrier@CarrierCode,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'right')~> JoinCarrier
DerivedFinancialFields select(mapColumn(
		ClaimTransactionKey,
		RowID = ClaimTransaction@RowID,
		CarrierCode = ClaimTransaction@CarrierCode,
		ClientCode,
		ValuationDate,
		{Policy Number},
		Claimant,
		Gender,
		LOBCode,
		ClaimStatus,
		MaritalStatus,
		ClaimTypeCode,
		Occupation,
		InjuryType,
		BodyPart,
		CauseType,
		Litigation,
		NAICS_Code,
		Total_Paid,
		Total_Reserve,
		Recovery_Total,
		Total_Incurred,
		Net_Incurred,
		Expense_Paid,
		Expense_Reserve,
		Expense_Recovery,
		Expense_Incurred,
		Medical_BI_Paid,
		Medical_BI_Reserves,
		Indemnity_PD_Paid,
		Indemnity_PD_Reserves,
		Incurred_BI_Med,
		Incurred_PD_LT,
		Recovery_BI_Med,
		Recovery_PD_LT,
		CarrierKey,
		CarrierCode = Carrier@CarrierCode,
		SystemCode,
		TotalRecoveries,
		MedicalPayments,
		MedicalRecoveries,
		IndemnityPayments,
		IndemnityRecoveries,
		ExpensePayments,
		OtherPayments,
		LegalPayments,
		ALAEPayments,
		ExpenseReserves,
		OtherReserves,
		LegalReserves,
		ALAEReserves,
		ExpenseRecoveries,
		OtherRecoveries,
		LegalRecoveries,
		ALAERecoveries,
		ExpenseIncurred,
		OtherIncurred,
		LegalIncurred,
		ALAEIncurred,
		LossLocationId,
		LossLocation,
		LossAddress,
		LossSource,
		LOB,
		InsuredName,
		ClaimNumber
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectColsToProcess
JoinCarrier, stageAMT1 join(ClaimTransaction@RowID == stageAMT1@RowID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinStage
JoinStage derive(Medical_BI_Paid = iif(SystemCode=='WC' || SystemCode=='WO',(coalesce(toDecimal(MedicalPayments),0.0) - coalesce(toDecimal(MedicalRecoveries),0.0)) , toDecimal(0)),
		Indemnity_PD_Paid = iif(SystemCode=='WC' || SystemCode=='WO',(coalesce(toDecimal(IndemnityPayments),0.0) - coalesce(toDecimal(IndemnityRecoveries),0.0)) , toDecimal(0)),
		Expense_Paid = iif(SystemCode=='WC' || SystemCode=='WO',(coalesce(toDecimal(ExpensePayments),0.0) + coalesce(toDecimal(OtherPayments),0.0) + coalesce(toDecimal(LegalPayments),0.0)), coalesce(toDecimal(ALAEPayments),0.0)),
		Expense_Reserve = iif(SystemCode=='WC' || SystemCode=='WO',(coalesce(toDecimal(ExpenseReserves),0.0) + coalesce(toDecimal(OtherReserves),0.0) + coalesce(toDecimal(LegalReserves),0.0)), coalesce(toDecimal(ALAEReserves),0.0)),
		Expense_Recovery = iif(SystemCode=='WC' || SystemCode=='WO',(coalesce(toDecimal(ExpenseRecoveries),0.0) + coalesce(toDecimal(OtherRecoveries),0.0) + coalesce(toDecimal(LegalRecoveries),0.0))*1, coalesce(toDecimal(ALAERecoveries),0.0)*1),
		Expense_Incurred = iif(SystemCode=='WC' || SystemCode=='WO',(coalesce(toDecimal(ExpenseIncurred),0.0) + coalesce(toDecimal(OtherIncurred),0.0) + coalesce(toDecimal(LegalIncurred),0.0)), coalesce(toDecimal(ALAEIncurred),0.0)),
		Litigation = iif(isNull(Litigation),false(),
iif(upper(Litigation)!='YES',false(),true())),
		Recovery_Total = toDecimal(TotalRecoveries)*-1) ~> DerivedFinancialFields
stageAMT1 select(mapColumn(
		SystemCode,
		LossLocationId,
		LossLocation,
		LossAddress,
		LossSource,
		LOB,
		InsuredName,
		RowID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectLocationMapFields
SelectClientKeyWithStage, ClientBasedLocationMap join(SelectClientKeyWithStage@InsuredName == ClientBasedLocationMap@InsuredName
	&& SelectClientKeyWithStage@LossLocationId == AMT1LocationMapSheet1@LossLocationId
	&& SelectClientKeyWithStage@LossLocation == ClientBasedLocationMap@LossLocation
	&& SelectClientKeyWithStage@LossAddress == ClientBasedLocationMap@LossAddress,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinClientBasedLocation
JoinClientBasedLocation derive(ClientBasedLocationName = {Location Name},
		ClientBasedDepartmentName = {Department Name},
		ClientBasedDivisionName = {Division Name}) ~> ClientBasedLocationFields
ClientBasedLocationFields select(mapColumn(
		ClientKey,
		RowID,
		ClientBasedLocationName,
		ClientBasedDepartmentName,
		ClientBasedDivisionName
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectClientBasedLocation
SelectLocationMapFields derive(LossLocation = trim(lower(LossLocation)),
		LossAddress = trim(lower(LossAddress)),
		LossSource = trim(lower(LossSource)),
		InsuredName = trim(lower(InsuredName))) ~> DerivedLocationMapCols
AMT1LocationMapSheet1 derive(InsuredName = trim(lower(InsuredName)),
		LossLocation = trim(lower(LossLocation)),
		LossAddress = trim(lower(LossAddress))) ~> ClientBasedLocationMap
SelectColsToProcess, SelectClientBasedLocation join(SelectColsToProcess@RowID == SelectClientBasedLocation@RowID,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinLocationKeySheet1
DimLocation filter(ClientKey==-99) ~> FilterLocationMap
ClaimTransaction, DimClient join(ClaimTransaction@ClientCode == DimClient@ClientCode,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinClient
JoinClient select(mapColumn(
		ClaimTransactionKey,
		RowID,
		ClientKey
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectClientKey
DerivedLocationMapCols, SelectClientKey join(SelectLocationMapFields@RowID == SelectClientKey@RowID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinClientKeyInfo
JoinClientKeyInfo select(mapColumn(
		SystemCode,
		LossLocationId,
		LossLocation,
		LossAddress,
		LossSource,
		LOB,
		InsuredName,
		ClaimTransactionKey,
		RowID = SelectLocationMapFields@RowID,
		ClientKey
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectClientKeyWithStage
SelectClientBasedLocationFields, ClaimNoBasedLocationMap join(ClaimNumber == {Claim #},
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinLocationKeyClaimNo
AMT1LocationMapClaimNo derive({Claim #} = toString({Claim #}),
		ClaimNoLocationName = {Location Name},
		ClaimNoDepartmentName = {Department Name},
		ClaimNoDivisionName = {Division Name}) ~> ClaimNoBasedLocationMap
DerivedLocationKeyFromClaimNo select(mapColumn(
		ClaimTransactionKey,
		RowID,
		CarrierCode,
		ClientCode,
		ValuationDate,
		{Policy Number},
		Claimant,
		Gender,
		LOBCode,
		ClaimStatus,
		MaritalStatus,
		ClaimTypeCode,
		Occupation,
		InjuryType,
		BodyPart,
		CauseType,
		Litigation,
		NAICS_Code,
		Total_Paid,
		Total_Reserve,
		Recovery_Total,
		Total_Incurred,
		Net_Incurred,
		Expense_Paid,
		Expense_Reserve,
		Expense_Recovery,
		Expense_Incurred,
		Medical_BI_Paid,
		Medical_BI_Reserves,
		Indemnity_PD_Paid,
		Indemnity_PD_Reserves,
		Incurred_BI_Med,
		Incurred_PD_LT,
		Recovery_BI_Med,
		Recovery_PD_LT,
		CarrierKey,
		SystemCode,
		TotalRecoveries,
		MedicalPayments,
		MedicalRecoveries,
		IndemnityPayments,
		IndemnityRecoveries,
		ExpensePayments,
		OtherPayments,
		LegalPayments,
		ALAEPayments,
		ExpenseReserves,
		OtherReserves,
		LegalReserves,
		ALAEReserves,
		ExpenseRecoveries,
		OtherRecoveries,
		LegalRecoveries,
		ALAERecoveries,
		ExpenseIncurred,
		OtherIncurred,
		LegalIncurred,
		ALAEIncurred,
		ClaimNumber,
		DerivedLocationName,
		DerivedDepartmentName,
		DerivedDivisionName,
		ClientKey
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectLocationDetails
JoinLocationKeySheet1 select(mapColumn(
		ClaimTransactionKey,
		RowID = SelectColsToProcess@RowID,
		CarrierCode,
		ClientCode,
		ValuationDate,
		{Policy Number},
		Claimant,
		Gender,
		LOBCode,
		ClaimStatus,
		MaritalStatus,
		ClaimTypeCode,
		Occupation,
		InjuryType,
		BodyPart,
		CauseType,
		Litigation,
		NAICS_Code,
		Total_Paid,
		Total_Reserve,
		Recovery_Total,
		Total_Incurred,
		Net_Incurred,
		Expense_Paid,
		Expense_Reserve,
		Expense_Recovery,
		Expense_Incurred,
		Medical_BI_Paid,
		Medical_BI_Reserves,
		Indemnity_PD_Paid,
		Indemnity_PD_Reserves,
		Incurred_BI_Med,
		Incurred_PD_LT,
		Recovery_BI_Med,
		Recovery_PD_LT,
		CarrierKey,
		SystemCode,
		TotalRecoveries,
		MedicalPayments,
		MedicalRecoveries,
		IndemnityPayments,
		IndemnityRecoveries,
		ExpensePayments,
		OtherPayments,
		LegalPayments,
		ALAEPayments,
		ExpenseReserves,
		OtherReserves,
		LegalReserves,
		ALAEReserves,
		ExpenseRecoveries,
		OtherRecoveries,
		LegalRecoveries,
		ALAERecoveries,
		ExpenseIncurred,
		OtherIncurred,
		LegalIncurred,
		ALAEIncurred,
		InsuredName,
		ClaimNumber,
		ClientBasedLocationName,
		ClientBasedDepartmentName,
		ClientBasedDivisionName,
		ClientKey
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectClientBasedLocationFields
JoinLocationKeyClaimNo derive(DerivedLocationName = iif(!isNull({Claim #} )&& !isNull(ClaimNoLocationName),ClaimNoLocationName,ClientBasedLocationName),
		DerivedDepartmentName = iif(!isNull({Claim #} )&& !isNull(ClaimNoDepartmentName),ClaimNoDepartmentName,ClientBasedDepartmentName),
		DerivedDivisionName = iif(!isNull({Claim #} )&& !isNull(ClaimNoDivisionName),ClaimNoDivisionName,ClientBasedDivisionName),
		ClientKey = iif(!isNull({Claim #} )&& !isNull(ClaimNoLocationName),-99,toInteger(ClientKey))) ~> DerivedLocationKeyFromClaimNo
ClientClaimTransaction derive(ClientGender = iif((isNull(Gender) || Gender !='Not Applicable'),Gender,'Unknown'),
		ClientOccupation = iif((isNull(Occupation) || Occupation !='Not Applicable'),Occupation,'Unknown'),
		KeystoneClientKey = ClientKey) ~> DerivedClientClaimFields
DerivedClientClaimFields select(mapColumn(
		ClaimNumber,
		ValuationDate,
		Location_Level1,
		Location_Level2,
		Location_Level3,
		KeystoneClientKey,
		ClientGender,
		ClientOccupation
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectClientClaimFields
SelectLocationDetails, SelectClientClaimFields join(SelectLocationDetails@ClaimNumber == SelectClientClaimFields@ClaimNumber
	&& SelectLocationDetails@ValuationDate == SelectClientClaimFields@ValuationDate,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinClientClaim
JoinClientClaim derive(Location_Name = iif(!isNull(Location_Level1),Location_Level1,DerivedLocationName),
		Department_Name = iif(!isNull(Location_Level2),Location_Level2,DerivedDepartmentName),
		Division_Name = iif(!isNull(Location_Level3),Location_Level3,DerivedDivisionName),

SelectFiledsAfterClientDataProcessing, DimLocation join(SelectFiledsAfterClientDataProcessing@ClientKey == DimLocation@ClientKey
	&& SelectFiledsAfterClientDataProcessing@Location_Name == DimLocation@Location_Name
	&& SelectFiledsAfterClientDataProcessing@Department_Name == DimLocation@Department_Name
	&& SelectFiledsAfterClientDataProcessing@Division_Name == DimLocation@Division_Name,

JoinDimClaim select(mapColumn(
		ClaimTransactionKey = SelectTranFieldsAfterLocationMapping@ClaimTransactionKey,
		RowID,
		CarrierCode,
		ClientCode,
		ValuationDate,

		Medical_BI_Reserves,

		Incurred_PD_LT,
		Recovery_BI_Med,
		Recovery_PD_LT,
		CarrierKey,
		TotalRecoveries,
		MedicalPayments,
		MedicalRecoveries,
		IndemnityPayments,

		Tenure,
		LagTime,
		DaysToClose,
		Age,
		{Employee Count}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectAfterClaimJoin
DerivedKeyFields, Occupation lookup(SelectAfterClaimJoin@Occupation == Occupation@Occupation,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupOccupation
LookupOccupation derive(AgeRange = iif(!isNull(Age),
iif(Age >=0 && Age<20, '0-19',iif(Age >=20 && Age<30, '20-29',iif(Age >=30 && Age<40, '30-39',
iif(Age >=40 && Age<50, '40-49',iif(Age >=50 && Age<60, '50-59',
iif(Age >=60 && Age<70, '60-69',iif(Age >=70 && Age<80, '70-79',iif(Age >=80 && Age<90, '80-89',
iif(Age >=90 && Age<100, '90-99',iif(Age >=100 && Age<110, '100-109',iif(Age >=110 && Age<120, '110-119',
iif(Age >=120 && Age<130, '120-129',iif(Age >=130 && Age<140, '130-139',
iif(Age >=140 && Age<150, '140-149','Unknown'))))))))))
)))
),'Unknown'
),
		TenureRange = iif(Tenure<0,'Unknown',
iif(Tenure >=0 && Tenure<90, '0-3 months',
iif(Tenure >=90 && Tenure< 90 * 2, '3-6 months',
iif(Tenure >=90 * 2 && Tenure< 90 * 3, '6-9 months',
iif(Tenure >=90 * 3 && Tenure<365, '9-12 months',
iif(Tenure >=365 && Tenure<365 * 5, '1-5 years',
iif(Tenure >=365 * 5 && Tenure<365 * 10, '5-10 years',
iif(Tenure >=365 * 10 && Tenure<365 * 15, '10-15 years',
iif(Tenure >=365 * 15 && Tenure<365 * 20, '15-20 years',
iif(Tenure >=365 * 20 && Tenure<365 * 25, '20-25 years',
iif(Tenure >=365 * 25 , '25+ years','Unknown'))))))))))
),
		LagTimeRange = iif(!isNull(LagTime),
iif(toInteger(LagTime) <=3, '0-3',
iif(toInteger(LagTime) <= 7, '4-7',
iif(toInteger(LagTime) <= 13, '8-13',
iif(toInteger(LagTime) <= 20, '14-20',
iif(toInteger(LagTime) <=100, '21-100','101+')
)))),'Unknown'),
		ClosePeriodRange = iif(isNull(DaysToClose) || DaysToClose<0,'Unknown',
iif(DaysToClose <= 90, '0-90 Days',
iif(DaysToClose <= 180, '91-180 Days',
iif(DaysToClose <= 365, '180 Days-12 Months',
iif(DaysToClose >= 365 && DaysToClose <= 545, '12 Months-18 Months',
iif(DaysToClose >= 546 && DaysToClose <= 365*2, '18 Months-2 Years','2+ Years')
))))),
		NetIncurredLossLevel = iif(isNull(Net_Incurred) || Net_Incurred<= 25000, '$0-25K',
iif(Net_Incurred <= 50000, '$25-50K',
iif(Net_Incurred <= 100000, '$50-100K',
iif(Net_Incurred <= 500000, '$100-500K',
iif(Net_Incurred <= 1000000, '$0.5-1M',
iif(Net_Incurred <= 2000000, '$1-2M',
iif(Net_Incurred > 2000000, '$2M+','Unknown'
))))))),
		TotalIncurredLossLevel = iif(isNull(Total_Incurred) || Total_Incurred<= 25000, '$0-25K',
iif(Total_Incurred <= 50000, '$25-50K',
iif(Total_Incurred <= 100000, '$50-100K',
iif(Total_Incurred <= 500000, '$100-500K',
iif(Total_Incurred <= 1000000, '$0.5-1M',
iif(Total_Incurred <= 2000000, '$1-2M',
iif(Total_Incurred > 2000000, '$2M+','Unknown'
)))))))) ~> DerivedRangeFields

DerivedRangeFields derive(NetLossAmtRangeKey = coalesce(cacheLossAmtRange#lookup(NetIncurredLossLevel).ClaimLossAmtRangeKey,99),
		ClaimLagAmountRangeKey = coalesce(cacheLagAmtRange#lookup(LagTimeRange).ClaimLagAmountRangeKey,99),
		ClaimTenureRangeKey = coalesce(cacheTenureRange#lookup(TenureRange).ClaimTenureRangeKey,99),

		TotalIncurredLossRangeKey = coalesce(cacheLossAmtRange#lookup(TotalIncurredLossLevel).ClaimLossAmtRangeKey,99),
		OccupationKey = iif(isNull(OccupationKey),-99,OccupationKey),
		Rollup_Priority = coalesce(cacheClaimTypePriority#lookup(ClaimTypeKey).Rollup_Priority,99)) ~> DerivedNetLossAmtRangeKey
SelectTransFieldswithKeys, Date lookup(ValuationDate == Date,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupDate
FilterClientKeys derive(Status_Priority = iif(ClaimStatus=="Open",1,iif(ClaimStatus=='Closed', 2, 99)),
		Litigation_Priority = iif(Litigation==true(),1,iif(Litigation==false(), 2, 99)),
		LastLoadTime = currentTimestamp(),
		ClaimType_Priority = Rollup_Priority,
		ValuationDateKey = DateKey,
		ClaimStatus = coalesce(ClaimStatus,'Open'),
		EmployeeCount = {Employee Count}) ~> ComputeRollupPriority
AggregateRows select(mapColumn(

SelectAfterClaimJoin derive(GenderKey = coalesce(cacheGender#lookup(Gender).GenderKey,99),
		MaritalStatusKey = coalesce(cacheMaritalStatus#lookup(MaritalStatus).MaritalStatusKey,99),
		ClaimTypeKey = coalesce(cacheClaimType#lookup(ClaimTypeCode).ClaimTypeKey,-99),
		CauseTypeKey = coalesce(cacheCauseType#lookup(CauseType).CauseTypeKey,-99),

		InjuryTypeKey = coalesce(cacheInjuryType#lookup(InjuryType).InjuryTypeKey,-99)) ~> DerivedKeyFields
LookupDate filter(ClientKey!=-99 && !isNull(ClientKey)) ~> FilterClientKeys
ComputeRollupPriority aggregate(groupBy(ClaimTransactionKey),
	each(match(!in(['ClaimTransactionKey'],name)), $$ = first($$))) ~> AggregateRows
SelectFinalTransFields sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	staged: false,
	preSQLs:[(concat('DELETE fc FROM FactClaimTransaction fc INNER JOIN DimClaim dc ON fc.ClaimKey=dc.ClaimKey INNER JOIN stage.ClaimTransaction sc ON dc.ClaimNumber=sc.ClaimNumber AND dc.Claimant=sc.Claimant AND dc.ClientCarrierGroupKey=sc.ClientCarrierGroupKey INNER JOIN DimDate dd ON dd.Date=sc.ValuationDate WHERE CarrierCode=',"'",$CarrierCode,"'"))],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	saveOrder: 2,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		ClaimStatus,
		Litigation,
		NAICS_Code,
		Total_Paid,
		Total_Reserve,
		Recovery_Total,
		Total_Incurred,
		Net_Incurred,
		Expense_Paid,
		Expense_Reserve,
		Expense_Recovery,
		Expense_Incurred,
		Medical_BI_Paid,
		Medical_BI_Reserves,
		Indemnity_PD_Paid,
		Indemnity_PD_Reserves,
		Incurred_BI_Med,
		Incurred_PD_LT,
		Recovery_BI_Med,
		Recovery_PD_LT,
		ClientKey,
		LocationKey,
		ClaimKey,
		ClientCarrierGroupKey,
		GenderKey,
		MaritalStatusKey,
		ClaimTypeKey,
		BodyPartKey,
		InjuryTypeKey,
		CauseTypeKey,
		OccupationKey,
		AgeRangeKey,
		ClaimTenureRangeKey,
		ClaimLagAmountRangeKey,
		ClaimClosePeriodRangeKey,
		NetLossAmtRangeKey,
		TotalIncurredLossRangeKey,
		Rollup_Priority,
		Status_Priority,
		Litigation_Priority,
		LastLoadTime,
		ClaimType_Priority,
		ValuationDateKey,
		ClaimKey,
		EmployeeCount
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 4,
		ClaimKey
	)) ~> FactTransaction
